A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Putting all the political nonsense in the movie aside\, it just wasn't a good story. There were some outstanding backdrops and sets in this movie\, that is the only reason I even gave it 1.5 stars. The Tomatometer gives this movie a 91%. My only guess is those reviews are coming from people trying to keep their jobs. I still am looking forward to more Star Wars content\, but only from creators like Dave Feloni.
